City Council
------------



Ballinger City Council meets the first and third Monday each month at 5:30 p.m. in the Council Chambers at City Hall, 700 Railroad Ave., unless otherwise noted prior to meeting.

[Meeting Agendas](https://www.baltx.org/meeting-agendas)
[Meeting Minutes](https://www.baltx.org/meeting-minutes)
[Meeting Videos](https://www.baltx.org/meeting-videos)
